name: try-serverless-haskell
description: I started off following the [serverless-haskell documentation](https://hackage.haskell.org/package/serverless-haskell-0.6.7) but I had to make sure to read the 0.6.7 which is what's available in Stack LTS-12.19. So when I ran `stack new` I was given 12.19 by default. I got into trouble following the new docs. Also important to note that I used 0.6.7 when I called the `npm install` command from those docs.
